description: Bill Engvill in a live comic performance.
name: Bill Engvall: Here's Your Sign Live

review.name: One of the best Stand-Up Comedians ever !
review.reviewBody:
Bill Engvall, who along with Jeff Foxworthy and Larry the Cable Guy, are the masters of gentle "Redneck" humor. 

Bill is not as well known as he'd like to be, but has gained popularity due to doing concerts with the two above comedians. He now has his own cable T.V. show and even if it doesn't last a reasonable season, it will still be entertaining. 

Here in this concert, he goes through all his basic routines where he jokes on marriage, sex, common mistakes, common sense and gives his view on things such as Steve Irwin and Viagra, which are some of the best skits out of the entire show. 

This skit doesn't contain excessive foul language and is suitable for the whole family.

Rated PG-13 for mild sexual suggestions and brief crude humor ( there isn't anything that the parents will find trouble explaining to teens, it's just a suitable concert for everyone ).

trailer.name: Bill Engvall: Heres Your Sign Live
